tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  findings TEXT,
  publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchFindings (
    research_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    research_title VARCHAR(255),
    modification_type VARCHAR(100),
    allergy_type VARCHAR(100),
    findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE genetic_modifications (
  modification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  modification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  modified_trait VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  modification_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE food_allergies (
  allergy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  allergy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  allergen_source VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  allergy_symptoms TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_id INT REFERENCES research_studies(study_id),
  modification_id INT REFERENCES genetic_modifications(modification_id),
  allergy_id INT REFERENCES food_allergies(allergy_id),
  result_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS research_studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  study_description TEXT,
  research_date DATE,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS research_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_id INT REFERENCES research_studies(study_id),
  modification_id INT REFERENCES genetic_modification(modification_id),
  allergy_id INT REFERENCES food_allergies(allergy_id),
  result_description TEXT,
  result_date DATE
);
